Pivot measure columns into tidy format

Source: R/tidy_transform.R
pivot_measure_columns.Rd

Pivot measure columns into tidy format

Usage

pivot_measure_columns(
  data,
  frequency = "annual",
  measure_cols,
  extract_regex = "^(count|mean|median|percentage|sum)_(.+)$"
)

Arguments

data

List of tidied data frames

frequency

Data frequency: "annual", "quarterly", or "monthly"

measure_cols

Character vector of measure column names to pivot

extract_regex

Regex for extracting statistic and measure. Defaults to standard pattern.

Value

Tidied tibble
